title: Heeraka Rathnalu Jhumka: Exquisite Diamond & Ruby Temple Earrings
materials: South Sea Pearl. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Classic temple Jhumka design. Features a floral stud with Polki diamonds accented with small rubies. A lustrous South Sea Pearl connects the stud to the Jhumka bell. The Jhumka is adorned with a row of Polki diamonds and rubies. Dangling ruby drops add a touch of traditional elegance. Intricate wirework showcases the craftsmanship of skilled artisans.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం) or half-saree function (అర్ధ శారీ వేడుక). Also suitable for special occasions where a touch of heritage is desired.
description: This Jhumka is a timeless piece that embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The use of Polki diamonds lends it a regal look, while the rubies add a pop of color and traditional significance. Crafted with the finest materials and attention to detail, this earring is sure to become a treasured heirloom. Perfect blend of tradition and elegance.
